product_name: The North Face Zahri Hoodie - Women's
long_description: The North Face Zahri hoodie for women features soft flannel lining, making it perfect for relaxing after a day of skiing. Or, stash it in your daypack for a light layer while hiking. Cozy cotton/polyester fleece hoodie offers easy-care comfort. 100% cotton plaid flannel lining feels soft and features a patterned contrast. Double-layer hood has drawcords. The North Face Zahri hoodie features patch-on kangaroo pockets to keep your hands warm. Logo patch at cuff.
short_description: The North Face Zahri hoodie for women features soft flannel lining, making it perfect for relaxing after a day of skiing. Or, stash it in your daypack for a light layer while hiking.
